div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 414 Drama ?, Macedonia, 1935 (339) Burial: 310-305 B.C. (Newell) Contents: 3 AV, 17 AR Philip II: 1 st.; 1 tetrob. Alexander III: 1 st.; 1 quarter-st. 13 early post. tetradr. (Am- phipolis 9, Marium 1, Side 2, unc. 1) 3 dr. (Sardes 1, Miletus 1, unc. 1) Disposition: unknown Information from W. Schwabacher
